it.polimi.ingsw.model.dice

Class DraftPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.dice.DraftPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DraftPool
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    DraftPool Class The Draft Pool is the place where all the dice are placed to be chosen for every turn
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private DiceBag diceBag
      Bag of all dices
      private java.util.List<Dice> listDraftPoolDice
      Array list containing all the Dices that can be chosen by the players during that turn
      private int numberOfPlayer
      Number of players in the current game
      private int sizeOfDraftpool
      Size of the DraftPool in the current game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DraftPool(DiceBag diceBag, int numberOfPlayer)
      Main constructor of the class Draft Pool It takes as parameter the dice bag and the number of players in order to initialize correctly the object The number of players is used to roll the draftpool dice (2 * numberOfPlayer + 1) and for the rounds of the players at each round (2 * numberOfPlayer)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Method used to roll the draft pool dice
      java.util.List<Dice> getListDraftPoolDice()
      Return the list of the dice inside the draftpool
      int getSizeDraftpool()
      Method used to retrieve the number of Dice currently in the draftpool
      Dice removeFromDraftPool()
      Method use to remove a single Dice from the Draft Pool and return it
      Dice removeSelectedDice(int index)
      Method use to remove a selected Dice from the Draft Pool and return it
      void reRollAll()
      Method used to roll again all the dices in the draft pool
      java.lang.String toString()
      Defined method toString to return a description of the Draft Pool content

    • Constructor Detail

      • DraftPool

        public DraftPool(DiceBag diceBag,
                 int numberOfPlayer)
        Main constructor of the class Draft Pool It takes as parameter the dice bag and the number of players in order to initialize correctly the object

        The number of players is used to roll the draftpool dice (2 * numberOfPlayer + 1) and for the rounds of the players at each round (2 * numberOfPlayer)

        Parameters:
        diceBag - Bag of all dices
        numberOfPlayer - to calculate the number of dices
